Definitions¶

class definitions.Component(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Defines the main class definition for the entire components module. This acts as a template to then allow better meshing between modded components or multiple collaborators. Thus, the use of such primitive classes makes it easy for the code to be expanded later, since any class which inherits from Component can be assigned a new method simply by changing it once in this class

Parameters:
  • position (Position) – Position of the current component in SI meter [m]
  • inside_fuselage – Although currently not implemented this would allow non-dimensioned fuselage creation where

parts could simply be assigned without constraints and the fuselage would be able to create a shell around them :type: inside_fuselage: bool

center_of_gravity[source]¶

Location of the center of gravity w.r.t the origin

Returns:Location Tuple in SI meter
Return type:Point
component_type[source]¶

An identifier to be able to lump masses together. Possible entries: ‘wing’ ‘fuselage’ ‘vt’ ‘ht’ ‘ct’ ‘boom’ ‘payload’ ‘prop’ ‘battery’ ‘electronics’

Returns:Component Type
internal_shape[source]¶

The geometry of the component that will be placed inside a structure, (i.e in a wing or fuselage)

Return type:parapy.geom
text_label[source]¶

Automatically creates a text label that inherits whatever object is labelled as. This can be hidden through use of the Input parameter hide_labels

Return type:TextLabel
text_label_position[source]¶

Sets the default position of the text_label to be on the front-left corner of the internal_shape

Return type:Point
weight[source]¶

Total mass of the component

Returns:Mass in SI kilogram
Return type:float
class definitions.ExternalBody(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
external_shape[source]¶

The final shape of a ExternalSurface class which is to be exported THIS PART MUST BE OVERWRITTEN!!!

Returns:External Shape
Return type:Box
planform_area[source]¶

The projected area of an external_shape when looking at the XY plane in the nadir direction (z)

Returns:Projected Area on the XY plane in SI sq. meter
Return type:float
surface_type[source]¶

An identifier to be able to lump areas together. Possible entries: ‘wing’ ‘fuselage’ ‘vt’ ‘ht’ ‘ct’ ‘boom’

Returns:Component Type
weight[source]¶

Total mass of the component

Returns:Mass in SI kilogram
Return type:float
wetted_area[source]¶

Returns the total wetted area of the external_part to be able to perform drag and weight estimations accurate to 3 decimal places. This is accomplished by subtracting the total shell area from the area of the intersected faces to obtain a fairly accurate wetted area.

Returns:Total wetted area of the external_part in SI sq. meter [m^2]
Return type:float
class definitions.VisualCG(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

VisualCG provides the user with a nice visualization of the C.G. location without relying in small and hard to see points

Returns:A sphere at the location of th specified center of gravity
visual_cg_location[source]¶

The sphere which is visibile in the GUI

Return type:Sphere
definitions.error_window(msg)[source]¶

Provides a simple easy way to bring up an error message, useful for reducing clutter around error-message calls within the code

definitions.warn_window(msg)[source]¶

Provides a simple easy way to bring up an warning message, useful for reducing clutter around error-message calls within the code
